comment._content: From a true Coffi (someone who was born in the Town of Caernarfon) take a look at www.caernarfononline.com and see the town today and all that is going there from the quey side now to the music of the towns talent like singer songwriter Sarah Lousie who's great great grandfather was the ferry master that took people and catle across the meani straits, and whos great grandmother was the towns pianist, from the silent movies to the monthly balls. and whos grandmother was born within the towns walls. Caernarfon is a grat litle town.
